monogr.title: A Dictionary of the Dialects of Vernacular Syriac as Spoken by the Eastern Syrians of Kurdistan, Northwest Persia, and the Plain of Moṣul, with Illustrations from the Dialects of the Jews of Zakhu and Azerbaijan, and of the Western Syrians of Ṭur ‘Abdin and Ma‘lula

body.bibl: Maclean, Arthur John. A Dictionary of the Dialects of Vernacular Syriac as Spoken by the Eastern Syrians of Kurdistan, Northwest Persia, and the Plain of Moṣul, with Illustrations from the Dialects of the Jews of Zakhu and Azerbaijan, and of the Western Syrians of Ṭur ‘Abdin and Ma‘lula. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1901.

Arthur John Maclean, A Dictionary of the Dialects of Vernacular Syriac as Spoken by the Eastern Syrians of Kurdistan, Northwest Persia, and the Plain of Moṣul, with Illustrations from the Dialects of the Jews of Zakhu and Azerbaijan, and of the Western Syrians of Ṭur ‘Abdin and Ma‘lula (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1901).
